metadata.comment: ### ?obId1 should be projected, however we cannot project it in this query as it demands ?obId1 to be grouped, which makes the semantics wrong.### as a result the latency cannot be evaluated.

queries.name: Q12
queries.body: select (count(?obId1) as ?obCnt) from stream <http://www.insight-centre.org/dataset/SampleEventService#AarhusTrafficData186979> [range 3000ms step 1s]  from <http://127.0.0.1:9000/WebGlCity/RDF/SensorRepository.rdf> where {?p1   a <http://www.insight-centre.org/citytraffic#CongestionLevel>.{?obId1 a ?ob.?obId1 <http://purl.oclc.org/NET/ssnx/ssn#observedProperty> ?p1.?obId1 <http://purl.oclc.org/NET/sao/hasValue> ?v1.?obId1 <http://purl.oclc.org/NET/ssnx/ssn#observedBy> ?service1.}Filter(?v1 >= -1)}group by ?service1 having (count(?obId1) > 3)
